achievements.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Software Engineer
details: Served as a technical lead on multiple projects, using various technologies such as React/React-Native, Qt C++, and C# .NET
Interfaced directly with clients and coordinate with fellow engineers to follow sprint based, agile software methodology
Created and maintained a quick start developer guide on how to use the React.js and ECMA6+ ecosystem
Established a foundation of coding guidelines and quality standards for developers using React.js and ECMA6+
Wrote and maintained multiple core internal JavaScript libraries, that provided reusable React components and utility APIs
Mentored and assisted junior level engineers by providing architectural design input and insightful code reviews

achievements.title: Software Engineering Intern
details: Maintained and provided new feature support for an existing in-house web application written in Angular.js
Created a cross-platform mobile application to demonstrate the company’s cloud service using React-Native
Ported the company’s primary product from Angular.js to React.js to allow faster development cycles

summary.name: Donald Bren School of Computer Science

achievements.title: Lab Tutor
details: Assist and advise students in programming assignments and general computer science topics
Explore and experiment the Python standard library as well as various third-party libraries with students
Outline pedagogical methods of teaching programming languages to inexperienced programmers

achievements.title: Senior Consultant
details: Supervise and manage day-to-day tasks of student employees, including hiring and scheduling of student staff
Provide first level support for clients and handle second level customer support escalation when required
Arrange materials and internal documentation to train both student and full time staff in computer networking
Organize and improve employee handbook policy using tools such as Confluence/Atlassian, Slack and Trello

achievements.title: Consultant
details: Service and support technical networking issues for residents across on-campus housing communities
Troubleshoot campus cable TV and the Application, Network, Data and Physical layers of the OSI Networking model

miscellaneous: Git Version Control (Git CLI and GitHub)

awards: Member of Tau Beta Pi, America's 2nd oldest Engineering and Computer Science Honor Society
